divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back yard smoking a cigarette at night, and i always look up in the sky allways.. and i notice the big oranges lights.. wow. so big .so BIG..the birst thing in my mind was my God i'm so lucky to see this event ,it will never happend to me again ,the first time when i saw it cross my mind this is not man made and if it is ??? ,i was in shock. I was looking at this thing and it was moving so slow ,to slow and no sound at all and i open the back door and call for my girlfriend ...come and see this right now . i look up again and it was gone in les than 2 secs the object was in a shape of a " V " but it was so big maybe 12 to 16 times bigger than a 737 airplanes... my girfried come over and then both of us saw 2 lights going up in less than a sec . i haven't toll any one about this .
Summary: 7 big orange light . no noise at all and the biggest i ever sow in my life .
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Miami Beach
There were no other sightings in Miami Beach on or around October 29th 2008
